system.sustained:
Everyone within range and line of sight who do not have flash protection (such as Photo-Visors or not having eyes) must make a +0 Agility Test or be blinded for 1d10 x Psy Rating rounds. Blinded targets automatically fail vision-based tests, move at half speed, and take -20 to any test involving fighting, movement, or reactions. The character can accidentally blind themselves if they don't close their eyes.
For every 10 points above threshold, range increases by 10m.
